sourcesContent:
Login

Email field must be valid
Password field must be valid
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { LoginForm } from 'src/app/types/Auth'; import { AuthService } from '../auth.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-login', templateUrl: './login.component.html', styleUrls: ['./login.component.css'], }) export class LoginComponent implements OnInit { form: LoginForm = { email: '', password: '', }; constructor(private authService: AuthService) {} ngOnInit(): void {} submit() { this.authService.login(this.form); } isLoading() { return this.authService.isLoading; } }
